seg.quote: The results were better than expected.
Milk is much better for you than lemonade.

sense.def:
Better
je tudi primernik prislova
well
.

seg.quote: Some people can ski better than others.

sense.def:
To like one thing better than another
pomeni imeti eno stvar raje kot drugo.

seg.quote: I love this place better than anywhere else.

sense.def:
Kadar je človek po bolezni ali poškodbi
better
, je že manj bolan.

Z besedo
better
tvorimo primernik sestavljenih pridevnikov, ki se začnejo z
good
ali
well
.

seg.quote: My husband was better-looking than that.
She's much better known in Europe.

sense.def:
Kadar nekdo
had better do something
pomeni, da bi določen človek moral tisto storiti.

Kadar je človek
better off
, je v boljših gmotnih razmerah ali položaju kakor prej.

seg.quote: They are much better off than they were two years ago.
She will be better off in hospital.

sense.def:
To change for the better
pomeni, da se nekaj izboljša.

seg.quote: The weather had changed for the better.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
gets the better of somebody
, se tisti človek nečemu ne more upreti.

seg.quote: My curiosity got the better of me.
